name: Crayon Shin-Chan: Densetsu o Yobu Omake no Miyako Shukkugaan!
overview: Crayon Shin-Chan: Densetsu o Yobu Omake no Miyako Shukkugaan! is an Action game, developed by Inti Creates and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 2006. The game is set in the special chapter of the series (with the same name as the video game) . During the game Shin-chan will find himself again in a sinister amusement park called Shock Gahn where he will have to get out of it with the help of his family and friends. Shin-chan will have some costumes that will add skills for each level.
